meanings.sent1: The strong wind overmasters the fragile umbrella.
meanings.sent2: The superhero overmasters the villain with ease.
meanings.sent3: The tiny ant overmasters the giant elephant in a surprising twist.
meanings.sent4: Her determination overmasters any obstacle in her path.
meanings.sent5: The roaring lion overmasters the silence of the night.

meanings.definition: To be superior to or dominate
meanings.sent1: His intelligence overmasters his classmates in every subject.
meanings.sent2: The champion boxer overmasters his opponents in the ring.
meanings.sent3: The clever rabbit overmasters the tricky fox in a game of wits.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness overmasters any negativity around her.
meanings.sent5: The bright sun overmasters the darkness of the night sky.

meanings.sent1: The hypnotist overmasters the audience with his mesmerizing performance.
meanings.sent2: The dictator overmasters the citizens through fear and manipulation.
meanings.sent3: The delicious aroma of freshly baked cookies overmasters my willpower.
meanings.sent4: Her charisma overmasters everyone she meets.
meanings.sent5: The enchanting melody overmasters my emotions and brings tears to my eyes.
